meanings.sent1: She was the only one left in the room.
meanings.sent2: The little one played with the toy car.
meanings.sent3: The lost one wandered around looking for its owner.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of faces, she stood out as the one.
meanings.sent5: The red one among the blue ones caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A person of a specified kind or character
meanings.sent1: He is the brave one who always stands up for others.
meanings.sent2: The funny one in the group made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy one tripped over his own feet again.
meanings.sent4: She is the creative one who comes up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The adventurous one always seeks new experiences and challenges.

meanings.definition: A person or thing of importance or consequence
meanings.sent1: The chosen one will lead us to victory.
meanings.sent2: The wise one's advice is always valuable.
meanings.sent3: The missing one in the puzzle made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The powerful one held the fate of the kingdom in their hands.
meanings.sent5: The legendary one's story inspired generations to come.
